content: New to FHIR, I'm trying to map patient and patient-related information to build a FHIR <Contract> record. The examples are disappointing, URIs such as http://hl7.org/fhir/consent-term-type-codes non existent. Is <Contract> not baked well enough for me to continue or does someone have advice?
Contract is still being worked on, yes
You'd be welcome to come work in the kitchen . . . :) Relevant work group is Financial Management with additional work from Security and Community Based Collaborative Care
Mostly this is being worked on weekly Friday calls focused on Privacy Consent Directive. So, please bring your ideas. Visit CBCC wg meetings this week to get face to face with some (not I).
